Dear Dr. Clark:
In response to your request for information about program-?
ming for the disadvantaged,.we are happy to report that
WUWM is already embarked on both programs and plans.
Following initial publication of excerpts from the Kerner
Commission Report in early March, WUWM taped and aired a
one-hour discussion of the report by two University of
Wisconsin-Milwaukee professors (one of them black) and
the pastor of.a Milwaukee core area church extensively
involved in racial issues. The program was of such
quality that it was- subsequently re-air
lar local FM station.
Later in the same month, we were planners and participants
in a two-day national conference on "THE MASS MEDIA AND
URBAN TURBULENCE" held at Wingspread,’ Racine, Wisconsin,
under sponsorship of the University and the Johnson Founda¬
tion of Racine. Some conference sessions and some inter¬
views were taped and have since been aired.
